property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ While this creature isn't linked, it can't attack. ■ When you put this creature, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a God Nova OMG from your graveyard to your hand. {RIGHT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Left God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Cross Gear (During your turn, you may pay the cost of this cross gear to cross a creature. Even if that creature leaves, this cross gear stays.) ■ Your cross gear cost 1 less to generate and cross. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Your samurai creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ The crossed creature gets +1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Dragon creatures cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, draw 3 cards and discard 3 cards from your hand. ■ During your turn, if you have no cards in your hand, you may summon a creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is discarded from your hand, if you have the water and fire civilizations in your mana zone and you don't have a 'Carol, Longinus Shout' in the battle zone, you may put this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have a water card and a fire card in your mana zone, return this creature to your hand instead.

property.value: ■ When you put this creature, draw a card, then discard a card from your hand. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less.

property.value: ■ When you put this creature, draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less.

card.name: Trump = Rampzenzenma / "Well, Let's Deal the Cards"

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may put a card from your graveyard on top of your deck. TWINPACT ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then put 4 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may put a card from your graveyard on top of your deck.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then put 4 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from your shield zone, shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this cross gear is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may generate it, and cross it with a creature for no cost.) ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ When you put this cross gear or whenever the crossed creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ When you put this cross gear, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose any number of Samurai from among them, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ The crossed creature gets "blocker". (You may tap a creature that has "blocker to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to that creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this spell gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS}: Choose one of your opponent's elements and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose a God or spell from among them, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, draw 2 cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Samurai creatures get "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness".)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may have more than 4 of this card in your deck. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ After this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, search your deck. You may take a Hachiko, Loyal Sword of Bukkomi from your deck and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you don't have a shield, search your deck. You may take a (Victory) creature from your deck and show that creature to your opponent. If that creature can evolve from this creature, put it on top of this creature. Otherwise, add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature, you may discard a Magic or Outrage from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have an Outrage in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While battling, this creature gets +2000 power. ■ During your opponent's turn, if your opponent would put a creature in any way except by summoning, your opponent puts that creature into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your cross gear cost 1 less to generate. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a Dragon in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a creature from them, show that creature to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your other Shinobi would leave the battle zone, you may put them into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then if you have 5 or less cards in your mana zone, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, draw up to 2 cards. Then discard the same number of cards you drew.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each creature in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less. {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, return your opponent's creatures that have power 5000 or less to their owner's hand. During your opponent's next turn, they can't put creatures that have power 5000 or less.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than this creature and destroy it. property.name: Rules
property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Hunter (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your Hunter in play. It can't cost less than 1.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature or whenever it attacks, Hunter Double Mechraid 10. (Hunter Double Mechraid 10: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. From among them, you may use up to 2 Hunter cards that cost 10 or less for no cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.) ■ If your opponent has 5 or more shields, this creature gets "speed attacker".
